page.title: 14Small Businesses, N. Lopham
page.content: In this quiet Norfolk village we have some unusual small businesses. One is a pop record company, which sells records around the world. The owner said that the record business is slowly declining, because more people are buying tapes instead of records. The owner has lived in the village for 8 years and has a barn instead of a proper studio. He lived in Ilford before, but thinks it is much nicer down here in the village. A second small, one-man business makes terrariums, glass cases for models and odd bits and pieces, using glass, copper and solder. The maker took up the craft several years ago as a hobby and takes 2-5 hours to make one terrarium. He said that terrariums can be filled with other things besides plants, e.g. silk flower arrangments.
